title.rendered: “Breaking News: IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Targets in Southern Lebanon – An In-Depth Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked military buildings and terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the areas of Marjayoun, al-Taybeh, Kfar Kila, and al-Adaisseh in southern Lebanon. In addition, this morning, Air Force fighter jets attacked a military building in the Mis-al-Jabal area in southern Lebanon.

The IDF fired artillery to eliminate threats in the Shebaa region in southern Lebanon.

In the last few hours, about 40 launches have been identified heading towards the territory of the State of Israel, some of them were intercepted, no casualties. The IDF attacked the sources of the fire.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3JOorgf
